reviewText:
The illustration & design for the cover art really hurts this package.
Ahhh, but don't let that stop you from buying this little gem of a DVD on Cartoonists & how they work. If you are an art student intent on earning a living as a cartoonist in comic books. Then you would do well to buy this dvd. Howard Chaykin & Steve Englehart talk about their work habits at length. I know a little bit about the world of a working cartoonist, being a cartoonist & film storyboard artist. Buy this dvd. you might liike it.
